archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0932
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a finance user, I require detailed reporting on credits issued to customers including customer account, customer segment, discount applied, reason for credit, team member applying credit etc)

properties.value: "Credit" to be clarified, is it credit note or adjustment? When it is created, manually or automatically? DX response: These are manual credit notes/adjustments made to customer accounts by sales/CRM team. I.e. give a customer a one off credit for billing issue or as goodwill for a complaint. We require a report that will show the detail of these manual credits applied to customer accounts. Both categories can exist, it can also be appied to discounts.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
